word: IN THESE LAST MOMENTS OF EARTH'S SINFUL HISTORY, TIMES ARE DIFFICULT AGAIN--AND ALSO EXCITING. SURELY GOD'S HOLY SPIRIT IS READY TO GIVE US THE POWER TO FINISH OUR WORK FOR OTHERS AND THE WORK NECESSARY FOR OURSELVES. CAN IT BE THAT YOU WILL BE ONE THROUGH WHOM GOD WILL DO SOMETHING SPECIAL? MAY YOUR CAREFUL STUDY HELP YOU TO BE BOTH EAGER AND READY TO MEET YOUR LORD WHEN HE RETURNS.
